plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_letters
plurals.item: "Maxfiy so'zda kamida 1 ta harf qatnashishi kerak"

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_lowercase
plurals.item: "Maxfiy so'zda kamida %d kichik harf qatnashishi kerak"
"Maxfiy so'zda kamida bitta kichik harf qatnashishi kerak"

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_uppercase
plurals.item: "Maxfiy so'zda kamida %d katta harf qatnashishi kerak"
"Maxfiy so'zda kamida bitta katta harf qatnashishi kerak"

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_numeric
plurals.item: "Maxfiy so'zda kamida bitta raqam qatnashishi kerak"

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_symbols
plurals.item: "Maxfiy so'zda kamida %d maxsus belgilar qatnashishi kerak"
"Maxfiy so'zda kamida bitta maxsus belgi qatnashishi kerak"

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_nonletter
plurals.item: "Maxfiy so'zda kamida %d harf bo'lmagan belgi qatnashishi kerak"
"Maxfiy so'zda kamida 1 ta harf bo'lmaga belgi qatnashishi kerak"
